name: The Greys Are Here
description:
Public Service Announcement:

The Greys do not exist... but if they did, you could probably move them using the W, A, S, and D keys. If they were armed with a futuristic death ray, it may be controlled using the Left Mouse button. The Right Mouse button enables them to jump... ahem... that is if they existed.

- Paid for by Lumen Corp.

The Not-So Fine Print:

This game was developed with Clickteam Fusion Free 2.5. All assets, excluding the music (which is Public Domain), were developed by zenvision for the #IWantToCreate Contest.
